EzTable.name: EzTable
EzTable.description:
EzTable is a high-performance, enterprise-grade data grid engine.
Built on TanStack Table v8, it combines lightweight core logic with powerful
features like virtualization, advanced filtering, and modular editing.


### Core Capabilities
- **Superior Performance**: Row and column virtualization for smooth handling of 100k+ records.
- **Smart Data Fetching**: Support for infinite scroll, server-side pagination, and caching via React Query.
- **Flexible Editing**: Choose between `Normal` (inline), `Dialog` (form-based), or `Batch` editing modes.
- **Advanced Interactivity**: Range selection, drag-and-drop column reordering, and context menus.
- **Data Intelligence**: Built-in export (Excel/CSV/PDF), column pinning, and grouping.

### Interactive Grouping
EzTable supports powerful grouping features:
- **Drag and Drop**: Drag any column header to the grouping panel above the table to group by that column.
- **Context Menu**: Right-click on any column header to access options like **Group by {column}**, **Ungroup**, and **Pin to Left/Right**.

### Minimal Example
```tsx
<EzTable
  data={employees}
  columns={[
    { accessorKey: 'name', header: 'Name' },
    { accessorKey: 'role', header: 'Role' }
  ]}
  pagination
  enableFiltering
/>
```

### Advanced Config: Editing & Persistence
```tsx
<EzTable
  data={data}
  columns={columns}
  editSettings={{
    allowEditing: true,
    mode: 'Batch',
    primaryKey: 'id'
  }}
  enablePersistence
  persistenceKey="user-table-grid"
  onBatchSave={(changes) => saveToDatabase(changes)}
/>
```

properties.name: adaptiveSizing
properties.description: Enable adaptive sizing for dynamic item heights.

properties.name: aggregates
properties.description:
Configuration for column aggregates (e.g. Sum, Average).
Displayed in the table footer.

properties.name: classNames
properties.description:
Custom class names for internal table elements.
Use strict mode class names or functions for dynamic styling.

properties.name: clipMode
properties.description:
Text clipping mode for all columns.
- `clip`: Text is clipped.
- `ellipsis`: Text is truncated with an ellipsis.
- `ellipsis-tooltip`: Text is truncated and a tooltip is shown on hover.

properties.name: columns
properties.description:
Configuration for the table columns.
Defines headers, accessors, cell rendering, and other per-column options.

properties.name: columnVirtualizationThreshold
properties.description: Number of columns after which virtualization kicks in.

properties.name: data
properties.description:
The data to display in the table. 
Can be an array of objects or an empty array.

properties.name: dir
properties.description: Direction of the text (ltr, rtl, auto)

properties.name: editSettings
properties.description: Configuration for editing behavior (mode, new row position).

properties.name: emptyRecordTemplate
properties.description: Custom template for when there are no records.

properties.name: enableAltRow
properties.description: Enable alternating row background colors (zebra striping).

properties.name: enableChangeTracking
properties.description: Enable change tracking for batch editing.

properties.name: enableColumnVirtualization
properties.description:
Enable horizontal column virtualization.
Recommended for tables with many columns (e.g. 50+).

properties.name: enableHtmlSanitizer
properties.description: Enable HTML sanitizer for cell content.

properties.name: enableInfiniteScroll
properties.description:
Enable Infinite Scrolling.
If true, `onEndReached` will be called when the user scrolls to the bottom.

properties.name: enablePersistence
properties.description: Enable state persistence (save settings to local storage).

properties.name: enableSearchHighlighting
properties.description: Enable highlighting of search terms in cells.

properties.name: enableStickyPagination
properties.description: Enable sticky pagination at the bottom.

properties.name: estimatedRowHeight
properties.description:
Estimated row height for virtualization.
Increase this if your rows are taller than 48px to improve scroll performance.
Default: 48

properties.name: filterSettings
properties.description: Configuration for filtering behavior (UI type, mode, etc).

properties.name: getRowId
properties.description:
Function to derive a unique ID for a row.
Defaults to looking for `id` property.

properties.name: getSubRows
properties.description: Function to get sub-rows for tree data.

properties.name: height
properties.description:
Height of the table. 
Accepts pixel number or CSS string (e.g. '500px').

properties.name: icons
properties.description: Custom icons for table elements (sort, filter, pagination, etc.).

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

properties.name: initialState
properties.description:
Initial state object for the table.
Use this to set the initial pagination, sorting, filtering, etc.

properties.name: isCellEditable
properties.description: Function to check if a cell is editable.

properties.name: isLoading
properties.description: Whether the table is in a loading state.

properties.name: isRowEditable
properties.description: Function to check if a row is editable.

properties.name: loadingTemplate
properties.description: Custom template for the loading state.

properties.name: localization
properties.description: Localization strings for the table (e.g. pagination labels, no rows message).

properties.name: overscanCount
properties.description:
Number of items to render outside the visible area.
Higher values reduce blank space during fast scrolling but increase memory usage.

properties.name: pageSettings
properties.description:
Configuration for pagination.
Defines page size, available page sizes, and initial page.

properties.name: persistenceKey
properties.description: Key to use for state persistence.

properties.name: prefetchDistance
properties.description: Distance in items to prefetch during scrolling.

properties.name: printMode
properties.description: Print mode (Current Page or All Pages).

properties.name: progressiveRendering
properties.description:
Progressive rendering for large datasets.
Renders rows in chunks to keep the UI responsive.

properties.name: query
properties.description:
Generic query parameters for server-side operations.
Passed to `onDataRequest`.

properties.name: renderDetailPanel
properties.description: Function to render a detail panel for expanding rows.

properties.name: renderNoRowsOverlay
properties.description: Custom overlay to render when there are no rows.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.description:
Total expected rows if knowing beforehand.
Crucial for server-side pagination to calculate total pages.

properties.name: rowHeight
properties.description:
Fixed row height for all rows.
Required for efficient virtualization.

properties.name: scrollBehavior
properties.description: Scroll behavior for the table (auto or smooth).

properties.name: scrollMargin
properties.description: Scroll margin (pixels) to apply to scroll container.

properties.name: scrollPaddingEnd
properties.description: Scroll padding end (pixels) to offset sticky elements.

properties.name: scrollPaddingStart
properties.description: Scroll padding start (pixels) to offset sticky elements or top padding.

properties.name: service
properties.description: Data service instance for remote operations.

properties.name: serviceRegistry
properties.description:
The shared service registry instance.
This is required to access shared services like HierarchyService, FocusManagerService, etc.

properties.name: slotProps
properties.description: Props to pass to the custom slots.

properties.name: slots
properties.description: Custom slots to override default internal components. Available slots: `toolbar`, `footer`, `noRowsOverlay`, `loadingOverlay`, `header`, `row`, `emptyRecord`.

properties.name: state
properties.description:
Controlled state object for the table.
Use this to control pagination, sorting, filtering, etc. from outside.

properties.name: textWrapSettings
properties.description: Configuration for text wrapping in cells and headers.

properties.name: toolbar
properties.description:
Toolbar items configuration.
Accepts an array of item names (strings) or detailed item objects.

properties.name: validateField
properties.description:
Function to validate a field during editing.
Return true if valid, or an error message string if invalid.

properties.name: width
properties.description:
Width of the table. 
Accepts pixel number or CSS string (e.g. '100%').

events.name: onRowEditStart

events.name: onRowSelect

events.name: onStateChange

events.name: onToolbarItemClick
events.description: Callback when a toolbar item is clicked.

EzScheduler.name: EzScheduler
EzScheduler.description:
EzScheduler is a comprehensive event management and resource scheduling engine.
It provides a fluid user experience for managing complex schedules across 
various view modes with full drag-and-drop and resizing support.


### Key Features
- **Multi-View System**: Switch between Day, Week, Work Week, Month, and various Timeline views.
- **Resource Management**: Group events by resources (people, rooms, equipment) with dedicated lanes.
- **Interactive Editing**: Intuitive drag-and-drop event movement, resizing, and double-click creation.
- **Intelligent Overlap**: Customizable overlap detection and blocking for intervals like lunch breaks.
- **Quick Info & Editor**: Built-in popovers for quick summaries and a full modal for detailed editing.
- **Virtualization**: Efficient rendering of large resource lists and event densities.

### Minimal Example
```tsx
<EzScheduler
  events={myEvents}
  view="Week"
  onEventChange={(event) => updateEvent(event)}
/>
```

### Resource Grouping Example
```tsx
<EzScheduler
  resources={[
    { id: '1', name: 'Meeting Room A', color: '#e11d48' },
    { id: '2', name: 'Meeting Room B', color: '#2563eb' }
  ]}
  events={events}
  view="TimelineDay"
  onEventCreate={(event) => createNewMeeting(event)}
/>
```

EzTreeView.name: EzTreeView
EzTreeView.description:
EzTreeView is a high-performance hierarchical data explorer.
It uses a virtualized engine to efficiently render trees with thousands of 
nodes while providing rich interactive features like drag-and-drop and 
multi-level selection.


### Key Features
- **Superior Virtualization**: Flat-list virtualization for smooth scrolling even with deep, expanded trees.
- **Flexible Selection**: Supports `single`, `multiple`, and `checkbox` selection modes with indeterminate state support.
- **Drag & Drop**: Native `@dnd-kit` integration for reordering nodes and changing parent-child relationships.
- **Inline Editing**: Double-click to rename nodes with built-in validation.
- **Search & Filter**: Real-time filtering with automatic expansion of matching parent nodes.
- **Custom Rendering**: Fully customizable node templates and icons via the `components` prop.

### Minimal Example
```tsx
<EzTreeView
  data={myTreeData}
  showCheckboxes
  onNodeClicked={(node) => console.log('Clicked:', node.text)}
/>
```

### Advanced Config: Virtualization & DND
```tsx
<EzTreeView
  data={largeTreeData}
  allowDragAndDrop
  allowEditing
  onNodeDrop={(dragged, target, position) => handleMove(dragged, target, position)}
  className="h-[400px] border rounded-md"
/>
```

properties.name: allowDragAndDrop
properties.description: Whether to allow drag-and-drop node reordering.

properties.name: allowEditing
properties.description: Whether to enable inline label editing.

properties.name: allowMultiSelection
properties.description: Whether to allow selecting multiple nodes (if selectionMode is multiple).

properties.name: allowTextWrap
properties.description: Whether to allow node labels to wrap to multiple lines.

properties.name: apiRef
properties.description: Reference to access the imperative API of the tree.

properties.name: autoCheck
properties.description: Whether to automatically check child nodes when parent is checked.

properties.description: Whether to allow checking nodes that are disabled.

properties.description: List of IDs for nodes that should be checked (controlled mode).

properties.name: checkOnClick
properties.description: Whether to toggle check state when a node is clicked.

properties.description:
Custom subcomponents (Slots) to override default rendering.
Allows fully custom rendering of nodes, icons, and checkboxes.

properties.description: Whether the full row should be navigable via keyboard.

properties.name: fullRowSelect
properties.description: Whether the full row should be triggers selection on click.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

properties.name: searchTerm
properties.description: Search term for real-time filtering and highlighting.

properties.name: selectedNodes
properties.description: List of IDs for nodes that should be selected (controlled mode).

properties.name: service
properties.description: Custom data service instance for the tree.

properties.name: serviceName
properties.description: Name of the global service to use for data operations.

properties.name: serviceRegistry
properties.description:
The shared service registry instance.
This is required to access shared services like HierarchyService, FocusManagerService, etc.

properties.name: showCheckboxes
properties.description: Whether to show checkboxes for tri-state selection.

EzLayout.name: EzLayout
EzLayout.description:
EzLayout is the foundational multi lingigual layout engine for Web/SaaS applications.
It provides a highly configurable and responsive shell that handles authentication,
headers, sidebars, and enterprise-grade multi-panel layouts.

properties.name: authConfig
properties.description:
Configuration for the built-in authentication slider.
Provides slots for sign-in and sign-up forms.

properties.name: breakpoint
properties.description: Breakpoint in pixels for mobile view.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Main content to be rendered within the layout.

properties.name: components
properties.description: Injected components to override or extend the default layout sections.

properties.name: contentClassName
properties.description: Custom class name for the main content area.

properties.name: dir
properties.description: Direction of the text (ltr, rtl, auto)

properties.name: enablePersistence
properties.description: Enable state persistence to localStorage for layout preferences.

properties.name: footerClassName
properties.description: Custom class name for the footer container.

properties.name: headerClassName
properties.description: Custom class name for the header container.

properties.name: headerConfig
properties.description: Configuration props passed to the default EzHeader component.

properties.name: headerHeight
properties.description: Height of the header in pixels.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

properties.name: mediaQuery
properties.description: Custom media query for fine-grained mobile breakpoint control.

properties.name: serviceRegistry
properties.description:
The shared service registry instance.
This is required to access shared services like HierarchyService, FocusManagerService, etc.

properties.name: sidebarClassName
properties.description: Custom class name for the sidebar container.

properties.name: sidebarWidth
properties.description: Width of the sidebar in pixels.

events.name: onAuthPageChange
events.description: Callback fired when the auth page changes (signin <-> signup).

events.name: onDataChangeCancel
events.description: Callback when data change is cancelled.

events.name: onDataChangeRequest
events.description: Callback when data change is requested.

events.name: onModeChange
events.description: Callback fired when the layout mode changes (e.g. dashboard <-> auth).

events.name: onSidebarToggle
events.description: Callback fired when the sidebar is toggled.

events.name: onViewportResize
events.description: Callback fired when the viewport resizes.

methods.name: getMainContentStyle
methods.description: Returns calculated CSS styles for the main content area.

methods.name: getServiceRegistry
methods.description: Returns the service registry used by the layout.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Returns a snapshot of the internal layout state.

methods.name: getViewport
methods.description: Returns current viewport dimensions and mobile status.

methods.name: isMobile
methods.description: Direct check if the layout is in mobile mode.

methods.name: isSidebarOpen
methods.description: Returns current visibility of the sidebar.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Forces a re-calculation of layout dimensions.

methods.name: removePanel
methods.description: Removes a side panel by its ID.

methods.name: toggleSidebar
methods.description: Toggles sidebar visibility or sets it explicitly.

EzSignature.name: EzSignature
EzSignature.description:
EzSignature is a high-fidelity digital ink and signature capture engine.
It provides a smooth, pressure-sensitive drawing experience using SVG 
and perfect-freehand algorithms, suitable for legal and formal validations.


### Key Features
- **Natural Ink Flow**: Advanced smoothing and streamlining for professional-looking signatures.
- **Pressure Sensitivity**: Dynamically adjusts stroke width based on pointer pressure.
- **Multi-Format Export**: Save signatures as high-resolution `PNG`, `JPEG`, or vector `SVG`.
- **Vector Persistence**: Stores signatures as geometric point data for lossless scaling and reproduction.
- **Undo/Redo Stack**: Full transactional history for correcting mistakes during capture.
- **Theme Aware**: Automatically adjusts stroke colors based on active theme or custom palettes.

### Minimal Example
```tsx
<EzSignature
  width={400}
  height={200}
  onSave={(dataUrl) => submitSignature(dataUrl)}
/>
```

### Imperative Control
```tsx
const sigRef = useRef<EzSignatureRef>(null);

return (
  <>
    <EzSignature ref={sigRef} />
    <button onClick={() => sigRef.current?.clear()}>Clear</button>
    <button onClick={() => sigRef.current?.save('png')}>Download</button>
  </>
);
```

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: Background color of the signature pad.

properties.name: dir
properties.description: Direction of the text (ltr, rtl, auto)

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

properties.name: serviceRegistry
properties.description:
The shared service registry instance.
This is required to access shared services like HierarchyService, FocusManagerService, etc.

properties.name: thinning
properties.description: Effect of pressure on the stroke's size.

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback when signature changes (after each stroke).

events.name: onDataChangeCancel
events.description: Callback when data change is cancelled.

events.name: onDataChangeRequest
events.description: Callback when data change is requested.

methods.name: getSignature
methods.description: Returns the geometric data of the signature.

methods.name: load
methods.description:
Loads a signature from a JSON string of points or Base64 (if supported).
Currently supports loading array of Point arrays.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the signature to a Base64 string.
